<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knock Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=3630) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 83

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own. Make a Strike against a [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) ally. The Strike is [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) and doesn't take a –2 penalty for using a weapon without the nonlethal trait; if you hit and deal damage, your ally automatically succeeds at the flat check to remove the confused condition when taking damage.
